title: The Server is Down!

story.setup: 2 AM. Your phone rings. The main web server is unresponsive and customers are complaining.
story.stakes: Every minute of downtime costs $10,000. Fix it fast!

technical.objective: Navigate to /var/log and check the system.log file for errors
technical.hiddenBonus: Use grep to filter for ERROR messages

successMessage: Crisis averted! You found the issue - a runaway process. The server is back online!
failureMessage: The server stayed down too long. The company lost significant revenue.

title: The Hacker's Trail

story.setup: Security team detected suspicious activity. Someone tried to access restricted files.
story.stakes: Find evidence before the hacker covers their tracks!

technical.objective: Search for any files modified in the last 24 hours
technical.hiddenBonus: Check for hidden files with ls -la

successMessage: Excellent work! You found the compromised files and secured the system.
failureMessage: The trail went cold. The hacker erased their tracks.

title: The Archive Quest

story.setup: An ancient backup contains critical data, but it's buried in nested directories.
story.stakes: The legal team needs this file for tomorrow's court case!

technical.objective: Find all .txt files containing the word 'contract'
technical.hiddenBonus: Use grep -l to list only filenames

successMessage: Success! You found the contract. The legal team is saved!
failureMessage: Time ran out. The case proceeds without the crucial evidence.

title: The Space Crisis

story.setup: Alert! The server is running out of disk space. Services are starting to fail.
story.stakes: Clear space before the database crashes!

technical.objective: Find and remove all .log files older than 30 days

successMessage: Disk space recovered! All services are running smoothly again.
failureMessage: The database crashed. Data recovery will take hours.

title: The Configuration Mystery

story.setup: The app won't start. Someone changed a configuration file but didn't document it.
story.stakes: The release is in 1 hour. Find and fix the configuration!

technical.objective: Compare two config files to find differences
technical.hiddenBonus: Use git to check recent changes

successMessage: Configuration fixed! The release proceeds on schedule.
failureMessage: Release delayed. The team works overtime to fix the issue.

title: The Zombie Process Hunt

story.setup: System performance is degrading. Multiple zombie processes are consuming resources.
story.stakes: Users are complaining about slow response times!

technical.objective: List all running processes and identify the zombies
technical.hiddenBonus: Use top or htop for real-time monitoring

successMessage: Zombies eliminated! System performance restored to normal.
failureMessage: System crashed under load. Emergency maintenance required.

title: The Permission Puzzle

story.setup: New team member can't access project files. Permission settings are misconfigured.
story.stakes: They need access NOW for the client presentation!

technical.objective: Make the project directory readable and writable for the team
technical.hiddenBonus: Use chown to set proper ownership

successMessage: Access granted! The presentation goes perfectly.
failureMessage: Presentation failed. The client is not impressed.

title: The Backup Mission

story.setup: Major update coming. You need to backup critical data before deployment.
story.stakes: If something goes wrong without a backup, data will be lost forever!

technical.objective: Create a compressed archive of the entire project directory

failureMessage: No backup created. A bug in deployment causes data loss.

title: The Network Detective

story.setup: API calls are failing. Is it our server or the network?
story.stakes: The mobile app is down for millions of users!

technical.objective: Test connectivity to the API server
technical.hiddenBonus: Use traceroute to find where packets are dropping

successMessage: Network issue identified and reported. Fix deployed quickly.
failureMessage: Unable to diagnose. Users remain frustrated for hours.

title: The Midnight Migration

story.setup: Database migration script must run tonight during maintenance window.
story.stakes: If migration fails, Monday morning will be chaos!

technical.objective: Schedule a script to run at 2 AM using cron
technical.hiddenBonus: Add logging to capture migration output

successMessage: Migration scheduled successfully. Monday starts smoothly!
failureMessage: Migration didn't run. Emergency fix needed Monday morning.
